thread.title: Calling All Peanut M&M's Fans! There's a Brand-New Flavor You Need to Try
thread.title_full: Calling All Peanut M&M's Fans! There's a Brand-New Flavor You Need to Try

author: Erin Cullum
title: Calling All Peanut M&M's Fans! There's a Brand-New Flavor You Need to Try
text:
A post shared by JunkBanter.com üç´üç∫üí™üèº (@junkbanter) on Feb 26, 2017 at 11:23am PST 
Another day, another new M&M's flavor! Strawberry Nut M&M's are the latest limited-edition flavor on the horizon, according to an Instagram photo posted by Junk Banter. This particular bag was spotted at Rite Aid, so head to your nearest store if you want to grab one ASAP. We're inclined to think that these will taste like the Strawberry M&M's from last year but a peanut-filled version instead (yum). In a world where regular M&M's are getting all the love, it's nice to see Peanut M&M's getting some exciting attention, right?
